resources.string: Oops! Picture for this feed cannot be saved.
Picture for this feed might not have been saved.
Oops! Picture for this feed cannot be retrieved.
Oops! This device does not appear connected to the Internet. Check Device Settings.
Oops! Downloads are disabled on Wifi and/or mobile networks, the download will not start. Check Application Settings.
Oops! Feed refreshes are disabled on Wifi and/or mobile networks, the refresh will not start. Check Application Settings.
You can add a feed by copying it to the clipboard. Then press this button.
Oops! Issue adding the feed. Please retry.
Do you want to add the feed located at

Welcome to Radiofeedz! 
It looks like you have no news in this list. 

You can add some more content from the catalog the '+' icon in the middle of the action bar, up there. 

Once you have some news, you can filter it by using the left panel, click the top-left app icon to access it!

I hope you will enjoy it!
Feed added. Find it in the left pane
